text: (nabiye!) muhudu verale sita ek rataka (janatava) gæna oba ovungen vimasanu. (viveka dina vana) senasurada dina (malu dadayam nokala yutuya yayi tahanam kara tabiyadi) ovun simava ikmava (malu dadayam) karamin sitiyaha. mandayat senasurada dinayanhi (ema muhude) malu ovun idiriyata pæmina, (jalaye uda mattamehi) tamange hisa digu karamin sitiyeya. senasurada novana dinayanhi ovun veta (ese) un pæminenne næta. ovun papayan karamin siti hetuven ovunva mese (itamat darunu) piriksumata lak kalemu
